title: OAKLAND WEEKENDER 2022 JUNE 23-25
details:
Oakland Weekender 2022 - Thurs June 23 - Sat 25th

Three stacked nights of banging indie-pop music. Bands representing the best that Slumberland and Emotional Response have to offer.
The bundled 3 night package comes with the Weekender t-shirt, poster and the Buzzocks tribute tape.

Cost: $60 for 3 Night Bundle (Includes Weekender t-shirt, poster and the Buzzocks tribute tape)
Advanced Single Night Ticket Cost: $20
Tickets at door per show: $25


LINE UP:

Thursday:
Neutrals
Cindy
Lunchbox
Blues Lawyer
Chime School
DJ Jessica B

Friday:
Peel Dream Magazine
Jeanines
Seablite
Kids On A Crime Spree
Artsick
DJ Poindexter

Saturday:
Mick Trouble
Boyracer
The Reds, Pinks & Purples
The Umbrellas
DJ Kid Frostbite
